localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Powered by tens of thousands of popular fully responsive visuals, SYQEL VJ is a simple to use desktop application that enables users to instantly visualize their mic or desktop audio feeds & easily use it as a window source in OBS or other broadcasting apps.
blogPost.body: Powered by tens of thousands of popular fully responsive visuals, SYQEL VJ is a simple to use desktop application that enables users to instantly visualize their mic or desktop audio feeds & easily use it as a window source in OBS or other broadcasting apps.
blogPost.title: SYQEL VJ - Automatic responsive visuals for your streams
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: SYQEL VJ是一款简单易用的桌面应用程序，它能让用户将他们的麦克风或桌面音频馈送即时可视化，并轻松地将其作为OBS或其他广播应用程序的窗口源。
localize.tagline: 为您的流媒体提供自动响应的视觉效果

localize.description: SYQEL VJ是一款簡單易用的桌面應用程序，它能讓用戶將他們的麥克風或桌面音頻饋送即時可視化，並輕鬆地將其作爲OBS或其他廣播應用程序的窗口源。
localize.tagline: 爲您的流媒體提供自動響應的視覺效果

previous.excerpt: Have you ever wanted to search for a remote job without getting tracked, being forced to sign in, having your resume crawled, or experiencing "location bias"? Ever felt like your job search has been at the expense of your privacy? We have. And we're fixing it.
previous.title: Remote Hill - Privacy-centric, international, remote-only job board

localize.description: 你是否曾经想找一份远程工作，而不被跟踪、不被强制登录、不被抓取简历、不遭遇 "位置偏见"？有没有觉得自己的求职是以牺牲自己的隐私为代价的？我们有。而且我们正在解决这个问题。
localize.tagline: 以隐私为中心的国际远程招聘网站。

localize.description: 你是否曾經想找一份遠程工作，而不被跟蹤、不被強制登錄、不被抓取簡歷、不遭遇 "位置偏見"？有沒有覺得自己的求職是以犧牲自己的隱私爲代價的？我們有。而且我們正在解決這個問題。
localize.tagline: 以隱私爲中心的國際遠程招聘網站。

next.excerpt: Clockk is a FREE AI-powered time tracking tool for digital agencies and freelancers. See what you worked on, when, by project. No more time sheet pain! Perfect for software devs, graphic designers, digital marketers, and anyone else who bills time. 🔥💰🚀
next.title: Clockk 2.0 - AI-powered time tracking for agencies and freelancers

localize.description: Clockk是一款免费的人工智能时间追踪工具，适用于数字机构和自由职业者。按项目查看您的工作内容、时间。不再有时间表的痛苦 非常适合软件开发人员、平面设计师、数字营销人员以及其他任何需要记录时间的人。🔥💰🚀
localize.tagline: 为机构和自由职业者提供人工智能驱动的时间跟踪服务

localize.description: Clockk是一款免費的人工智能時間追蹤工具，適用於數字機構和自由職業者。按項目查看您的工作內容、時間。不再有時間表的痛苦 非常適合軟件開發人員、平面設計師、數字營銷人員以及其他任何需要記錄時間的人。🔥💰🚀
localize.tagline: 爲機構和自由職業者提供人工智能驅動的時間跟蹤服務
